work.title: Facilities Coordinator/ Project Manager
work.description: responsible for overseeing all activities inside a building, making sure that health and safety standards are met, and also maintaining critical facilities. Arrange for repairs if needed, as well as construction projects such as office and floor renovation. Track expenses, coordinate with external vendors, and initiate procurement and import of office goods. Coordinate with Headquarters in Australia as well as other office locations all over the world. Manage a maintenance team consisting of 5
